verbiage, wordiness, tautology, blabber, chatter, unnecessary talk
to carry a joke too far

sense.gloss: to pass (something) off as a joke
being somewhat (half) joking, half seriously, half in jest, in a jocular vein
half joking, being (only) half serious, (in a) jocular vein
jokingly, in the form of a joke

sdata.j: ↑冗談↑↓じょうだん↓でしょ！？

sdata.j: ↑冗談↑↓じょうだん↓じゃねえよ。

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑冗談↑↓じょうだん↓なのか↑本気↑↓ほんき↓なのか。
sdata.e: Are you in jest or in earnest?
